original_text: And the Lord said unto Cain, Why art thou wroth? and why is thy countenance fallen?
korean_text: 여호와께서 가인에게 이르시되 네가 분하여 함은 어찌 됨이며 안색이 변함은 어찌 됨이냐

sentences.original_text: And the Lord said unto Cain
and why is thy countenance fallen?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 얼굴 빛이 어찌하여 어두워졌느냐?
